title: Prepare a Deposition Summary
description: A junior associate needs to read a 200-page deposition transcript and prepare a summary for the lead attorney.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the full text of the transcript.

tasks.description: Identify and extract key testimony related to the central themes of the case.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls out the most important questions and answers.

tasks.description: Create a chronological or topic-based summary of the testimony, including page and line numbers for key admissions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a well-organized, accurate summary that is easy to navigate.
